column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Margaret - Thanks for your review. I'm sorry to hear you received a ramen bowl that was not at an ideal temperature. I always like to emphasize that if you receive any item from us that you're not 100% satisfied with
column2: we will happily remake it for you as quickly as possible. And despite your feeling "underwhelmed" with most of our ramen dishes
column4: and I can only say that our corporate headquarters are constantly coming up with new menu items with the aim of keeping our menu fresh
column6: innovative and creative. That is our goal. Thanks again.
